name: DotShooterDX
description:
Put on your trance trousers, open your third eye and defend the temporal dimension!

Take a trip back to 1992 where all that mattered was a high score, plenty of noise and graphics that made your eyes bleed*

Grab an XBox controller, plug it in your PC and shoot all the moving things!

DotShooter DX from NCoT Software on Vimeo.

* Bleeding eyes not guaranteed
